channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Left Is Nowhere Near Letting Go Of Its Trans Obsession
item.description: The left's approach to defending transgenderism may fluctuate, but its loyalty is unshakeable.

item.title: Anti-Natalists At NYT Want You To Think IVF Is The Only Way To Have A Career
item.description: Establishing a norm of egg freezing and IVF will further entrench the view that marriage is a capstone in life, rather than a foundation.

item.title: Is President Trump Thinking About Greenland Again?
item.description: Much-touted pharmaceutical deals could end up giving the president new leverage.

item.title: Trump, Harris and big money transform Tennessee special election into marquee contest

item.title: The Terms of Ukraine’s Defeat, and Ours
item.description: If adopted, the proposed peace plan would yield a victory to Moscow greater than the one it set out to achieve on the battlefield.

item.title: Here’s Why Gavin Newsom’s Race-Based Gerrymandering In CA Will Fail
item.description: 'It’s pretty blatant that they were using race when they drew up new districts to get rid of Republicans,' said Hans von Spakovsky.

item.title: Comer threatens contempt of Congress against Clintons over Epstein testimony

item.title: The Media’s Latest Push To Sink Comey Indictment Was Entirely Based On A Lie
item.description: 'Any assertion that the grand jury 'never voted on the two-count indictment' is contradicted by the official transcript,' a DOJ filing states.

item.title: Nuremberg in the Age of Lawfare
item.description: A warped history of justice, Tarantino-style.

item.title: Rep. Jason Crow says Trump's 'seditious' comment is attempt to gag him, fellow Democrats

item.title: Pro-Life Center Takes Its Fight Against Democrat Lawfare To The Supreme Court
item.description: 'It's our hope that our efforts will result in protection for pregnancy centers across the nation,' said First Choice Executive Director Aimee Huber.

item.title: The Ukrainians Have Room to Maneuver in Peace Deal Proposal
item.description: The plan on offer is better than originally reported. Ukraine should work to make the Russians say no.

item.title: House votes to oppose socialist policies as Mamdani meets with Trump

item.title: Going Nuclear
item.description: The Trump administration is right to make nuclear power part of the U.S. energy solution.
